extension.name: Image Focus Field
extension.description: A Symphony CMS extension that works with the Media Library field to create a position picker tool with visualisation.

releases.release: - Make sure we don't get negative values as this can cause errors when positioning on the frontend
- start at 50/50 instead of 0/0 for better default positioning
- add imagesLoaded before checking for image coordinates to ensure width/height is returned
- Check if the image selected exists, and return a message if it can't instead of showing broken image source
- Add a check to ensure only images are displayed
